references.paper_title: Semi-Supervised Classification with Graph Convolutional Networks
references.reason: This paper is foundational for many GCN based methods and is highly influential in the field of graph neural networks.
This paper introduced the graph attention mechanism, a crucial component in many modern graph neural network architectures.

references.paper_title: Neural Message Passing for Quantum Chemistry
references.reason: This work established message passing neural networks (MPNNs) as a powerful and flexible framework for graph representation learning.

references.paper_title: Inductive Representation Learning on Large Graphs
references.reason: This paper introduced a widely adopted method for inductive learning on graph structured data, improving the generalizability of graph neural networks.

references.paper_title: Flamingo: A Visual Language Model for Few-Shot Learning
references.reason: This paper introduced Flamingo, a visual language model that significantly advances the state-of-the-art in vision-language tasks and is highly relevant to the paper's vision-language integration approach.
